name: Smartfish Group
description:
We are a full-service brand design firm that creates engaging and effective marketing solutions. We are spearheaded by an experienced team of marketing and creative leaders who are relentlessly committed to delivering great results for our clients.
There are many factors that go in to choosing the right agency.  Smartfish Group’s mission is to be the one that always gets the job done right.  We want to work harder, smarter, faster and in a much more collaborative way than the competition.
We also take a lot of pride in our client diversity.  We work with some of the biggest CPG companies in the business, but we are just as proud to be a part of many venture and start-up clients as well.
And above all else, we absolutely love what we do.  We love the process of listening, ideating, creating, and executing on behalf our clients.  It’s what gets us out of bed every morning and we look forward to the moments when we can celebrate successes at the end of the day.
Thanks again for visiting Smartfish, nice to have you here.
